akn:section.akn:heading: Repealed. Pub. L. 98–181, title I [title IV, § 474(e)], Nov. 30, 1983, 97 Stat. 1239

akn:content.akn:p:
§ 3911. Repealed. Pub. L. 98–181, title I [title IV, § 474(e)], Nov. 30, 1983, 97 Stat. 1239
Section, Pub. L. 90–448, title IV, § 412, 1, 1968, 82 Stat. 516; Pub. L. 91–152, title III, § 304, Dec. 24, 1969, 83 Stat. 391; Pub. L. 91–609, title III, § 303(b), Dec. 31, 1970, 84 Stat. 1780, provided for supplementary grants under this chapter.
